title: Continuous Deformation
caption: Homotopy is a large-scale, interactive rope sculpture inspired by the mathematical fields of topology and knot theory. The sculpture is composed of three separate bands of rope webbing intertwined together to form a Borromean braid.
Rope and Photo by Marceline VQ
img_alt: A large rope sculpture on a black background

title: The life of an object
caption: As the viewer interacts with the sculpture, the shape and tension in the rope changes. Although the design is geometric in nature, its form is still organic, responding to participants with a dynamic life of its own.
Modeling by Anya Demure, Rope and Photo by Marceline VQ

title: Design
caption: This work was thoroughly researched and thoughtfully designed prior to construction. Each band is tied separately, with edges connecting to corners of the external cube structure. Support lines create the shape of the bands, which are then filled in with complex webbing.
Rope and Modeling by Marceline VQ, Photo by Anya Demure

caption: ROPECRAFT Convention is a new approach for a kinky bondage conference. Shibari, Western Bondage, Power Exchange, Solo Tying, Health, & PLAY. It's Knot - For Everyone!
